import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import React from "react"; const BlogListItem = (props) => { return (
  • {props.item.author}
  • {props.item.time}
  • ({props.item.comments}) Coments

{props.item.title}

{props.item.summary}

Read more
); }; export default BlogListItem;
